name: Spider-Man Demastered
description:
It's spiders man!!!

In this game you play metres morals the new spider man trying to save stanley from the crutches of the green gobbling!!! push the cars out of the way to win game but watch out because green gobbin come to get you!!!

Made for Jack,  Happy Birthday!

CONTROLS

wasd - move

space - jump

q+e - shove

m and .  OR left/right mouse click- grab/pick up

have a very spider man!
